EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Boston_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed - Pivotal Analytics Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Analytics Roadshow! Please see your event details below.
Date: Tuesday, 9 May 2017
Time:
8:00am - 1:15pm Strategy Session 1:15pm - 5:15pm Data Science Workshop Session (Limited Seating and for practitioners only)
Location:
Pivotal Boston Office 255 Main St 6th Floor Cambridge, MA 02142 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/255+Main+St,+Cambridge,+MA+02142/@42.3626831,-71.087541,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89e370a5f4efd825:0xc0c5b9cf0dd14f59!8m2!3d42.3626831!4d-71.0853523?hl=en]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/boston?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
